description: First floor rear extension to existing flat and installation of a new walkway via existing rear staircase.
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.  Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plan: 3244-7C: Proposed Rear Extension to Existing First Floor Flat: Plans & Elevations, date April 2015.  Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the existing materials or those as described on the plans.  Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings in accordance with the Council's adopted Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) policies Local Variation 7.4 and 7B, policies 1.1(h), and 1.2(g) of the adopted Local Development Framework (Core Strategy 2012) and policies 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan (Consolidated 2015).
